body: In her blog, Eduarda Santos - a portuguese advocate for transgender rights - points several examples [pt] of transphobic prejudice by the mainstream media. In January she had posted a thorough analysis [pt] of President Cavaco Silva's enactment against the change of name and gender of transsexual people.
original_body: In her blog, Eduarda Santos - a portuguese advocate for transgender rights - points several examples [pt] of transphobic prejudice by the mainstream media. In January she had posted a thorough analysis [pt] of President Cavaco Silva's enactment against the change of name and gender of transsexual people.
title: Portugal: Fight against prejudice on transgenderism
